channel.title: Notes on Jeff Stagg
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Jeff Stagg
channel.copyright: Intellectual Property laws create an artificial scarcity by controlling supply of the product.

item.title: Starting Canon Rebel T6 DSLR Camera as Webcam
item.description: Turn on camera and plug in USB. Then find your camera. gphoto2 --auto-detect When your camera is displayed, start capturing with gphoto, and output with ffmpeg. gphoto2 --stdout --capture-movie | ffmpeg -i - -vcodec rawvideo -pix_fmt yuv420p -threads 0 -f v4l2 /dev/video0
item.content:
Turn on camera and plug in USB. Then find your camera.
gphoto2 --auto-detect

When your camera is displayed, start capturing with gphoto, and output with ffmpeg.
gphoto2 --stdout --capture-movie | ffmpeg -i - -vcodec rawvideo -pix_fmt yuv420p -threads 0 -f v4l2 /dev/video0

item.title: Regenerate Host Keys
item.description: Regenerate your host keys in a new ProxMox container from template: sudo dpkg-reconfigure openssh-server
item.content:
Regenerate your host keys in a new ProxMox container from template:

sudo dpkg-reconfigure openssh-server
